[[inst_ld_smax]]
==== LD.SMAX

*Syntax:* ld.smax<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Signed Max operation: memory value is atomically signed maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_smax.svg[LD.SMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
